test tools


tools to declare & run tests


C_TEST_NAME_NULL

#define C_TEST_NAME_NULL "null"
type: C preprocessor definition
description: name of null test/suite

C_TEST_NULL

#define C_TEST_NULL { C_TEST_NAME_NULL, NULL }
type: C preprocessor definition
description: null test initialization

C_TEST_SUITE_NULL

#define C_TEST_SUITE_NULL { C_TEST_NAME_NULL, NULL }
type: C preprocessor definition
description: null suite initialization

test_func

typedef void (*test_func)(TestResult*);
type: C typedef
description: test function type

Test

typedef struct {
  char      name[64];
  test_func function;
} Test;
type: C struct
description: test struct with test name and function

TestSuite

typedef struct {
  char  name[64];
  Test *tests; /* array of tests terminated by a null test */
} TestSuite;
type: C struct
description: test suite struct with suite name and tests

gc_test_suite_null

extern const TestSuite gc_test_suite_null;
type: C variable
description: null test suite

ftest_run

int ftest_run(const char *module, TestSuite *suites);
type: C function
description: runs all tests suite
module: name of test module
suites: array of TestSuite terminated with a null test suite
returns: 0 if test is successful
